caption.p: Assessment of hatchability and heart rate of zebrafish embryos. ( A) Percentage of embryos hatching of zebrafish treated with ZO essential oil. ( B) Correlation between the dose of ZO essential oil and zebrafish larvae heart rate (bpm) at 72 hpf. Data are presented as mean ± SD of three independent experiments ( n = 60 embryos/group). Data were analyzed using one-way ANOVA and Tukey’s multiple comparison test. Different lowercase letters indicate significant differences between groups ( p < 0.05).
